column1: '''Radhrim''' (Raðrim) was a forested region in eastern [[Doriath]]
column2: located between the rivers [[Aros]] and [[Celon]].<ref name=WJBeleriand>{{WJ|Beleriand}}
column4: 189</ref><ref name=LR/> Although what appears to be the same region is also called [[Arthórien]]
column5: <ref name=WJBeleriand/> it is unknown if these two regions were the same (or if one was situated within the other).

column2: the [[Doriathrin]] name ''Radhrim'' is glossed as "East-march".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}
